vocabinfos.relatedNos: [{'strongNumber': 'G1003', 'matchingForm': 'Βοόζ', 'stepTransliteration': 'booz', 'gloss': 'Boaz', '_searchResultRange': 'Matt.1.5-Luke.3.32@Ruth.2.1-Luke.3.32', '_zh_tw_Gloss': '波阿斯', '_es_Gloss': 'Booz ', '_zh_Gloss': '波阿斯'}, {'strongNumber': 'H1162H', 'matchingForm': 'בֹּ֫עַז ', 'stepTransliteration': 'bo.az ', 'gloss': 'Boaz', '_zh_tw_Gloss': '波阿斯', '_es_Gloss': 'Booz', '_zh_Gloss': '波阿斯'}]
vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Israel before the Monarchy, first mentioned at Rut.2.1;
son of: Salmon (H8007) and Rahab (H7343); married to Ruth (H7327);
father of: Obed (H5744)
Also named: Booz<\i> (Βοόζ "Boaz" G1003)
§ Boaz = "fleetness"
1) ancestor of David, kinsman-redeemer to Ruth, daughter-in-law of Naomi
2) name of the left of two brazen pillars, 18 cubits high, erected in the porch of Solomon's temple
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   hijo de Salmá, Salmón; esposo de Rut; tribu de Judá; (b)   pilar en el templo de Salomón
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
波阿斯 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "快速"
1) 大衛的祖先, 拿俄米的親屬, 與路得成婚
2) 建在所羅門殿中走廊上的兩根柱子左邊那一根的名字, 有18腕尺高
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
波阿斯 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "快速"
1) 大卫的祖先, 拿俄米的亲属, 与路得成婚
2) 建在所罗门殿中走廊上的两根柱子左边那一根的名字, 有18腕尺高

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
§ Boaz = "fleetness"
This name is used for:
1) ancestor of David, kinsman-redeemer to Ruth, daughter-in-law of Naomi
2) name of the left of two brazen pillars, 18 cubits high, erected in the porch of Solomon's temple
